maiet.SCRIPT:
function NPC_520010:Init(NPCID) --[[ User Data 1: 가면 2: 지팡이 3~9: 미니언 ID --]]
NPC_520010.UD_PAIN = 1 NPC_520010.UD_STAFF = 2 NPC_520010.UD_DATASIZE = 2 NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, NPC_520010.UD_DATASIZE )
NPC_520010.MODE_DEFAULT = 0 NPC_520010.MODE_BREAKSTICK = 1 NPC_520010.MODE_LEVITATION = 2 NPC_520010.MODE_HIGHTLEVITATION = 3
local MaxHP = NPC_520010.MaxHP NPC_520010.LIMIT_PAIN = MaxHP * 0.05 NPC_520010.LIMIT_BREAKSTICK = MaxHP * 0.7 -- 지팡이
NPC_520010.BPART_MASK = 1 NPC_520010.BPART_STAFF = 2
NPC_520010.TALENT_Levitation_Fire = 252001021 NPC_520010.TALENT_Levitation_Fire2 = 252001023 NPC_520010.TALENT_Levitation_Finish = 252001022 NPC_520010.TALENT_HightLevitation_Start = 252001050 NPC_520010.TALENT_HightLevitation_Finish = 252001051 NPC_520010.TALENT_ShowFace_Fast = 252001042 NPC_520010.TALENT_ShowFace_Say = 252001008
NPC_520010.TALENT_PAIN = 252001005 NPC_520010.TALENT_BreakStick = 252001006 NPC_520010.TALENT_BackAttack = 252001015
NPC_520010.MARKER_Levitation = 20111111
-- 책 NPC_520010.BOOK_SpawnID = 20111111 NPC_520010.BOOK_COUNT = 5 NPC_520010.BOOK_Levitation = 252001100 NPC_520010.BOOK_FIRE = 252001101 NPC_520010.BOOK_LANDING = 252001110
-- 화로 NPC_520010.BRAZIER_SpawnID = 20111121 NPC_520010.BRAZIER_COUNT = 2 NPC_520010.BRAZIER_Levitation = 252001600 NPC_520010.BRAZIER_FIRE = 252001601 NPC_520010.BRAZIER_LANDING = 252001610
-- 의자 NPC_520010.CHAIR_SpawnID = 20111131 NPC_520010.CHAIR_COUNT = 2 NPC_520010.CHAIR_Levitation = 252001700 NPC_520010.CHAIR_FIRE = 252001701 NPC_520010.CHAIR_LANDING = 252001710
NPC_520010.TIMER_Levitation_ID = 1 NPC_520010.TIMER_Levitation_TIME = 10
NPC_520010.TIMER_HightLevitation_ID = 2 NPC_520010.TIMER_HightLevitation_TIME = 5
end
-- 전투 전 이벤트(어서오시오) function NPC_520010:OnSayNow( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC(ThisActor) ThisNPC:SayNow("$$COLT_0520010_3") end
-- 전투 중 이벤트(용모설명) function NPC_520010:OnSayNow2( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC(ThisActor) ThisNPC:SayNow("$$COLT_0520010_6") end
-- 전투 중 이벤트(지팡이 놓치기) function NPC_520010:OnSayNow3( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC(ThisActor) ThisNPC:SayNow("$$COLT_0520010_7") end
-- 전투 중 이벤트(불쇼) function NPC_520010:OnSayNow4( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC(ThisActor) ThisNPC:NarrationNow("$$COLT_0520010_17") end
-- 전투 중 이벤트(공중부유) function NPC_520010:OnSayNow5( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC(ThisActor) ThisNPC:NarrationNow("$$COLT_0520010_14") end
-- 뒤공격 function NPC_520010:BackAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) local IsRear = Enemy:IsRear( ThisNPC )
if Dist < 500 and IsRear then if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.TALENT_BackAttack ) end end end
function NPC_520010:OnBPartRecover() this:SetUserData( NPC_520010.UD_MASK, 0 ) this:SetUserData( NPC_520010.UD_STAFF, 0 ) end
-- 공중 부양 시작 function NPC_520010:OnStartLevitation( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog("NPC_520010:OnStartLevitation()\n")
local Field = ThisActor:GetField() local Minion
for i = 0, NPC_520010.BOOK_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.BOOK_SpawnID+i ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.BOOK_Levitation ) end -- for
for i = 0, NPC_520010.BRAZIER_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.BRAZIER_SpawnID+i ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.BRAZIER_Levitation ) end -- for
for i = 0, NPC_520010.CHAIR_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.CHAIR_SpawnID+i ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.CHAIR_Levitation ) end -- for
local ThisNPC = AsNPC(ThisActor) local dice = math.random(0,2) if( dice == 0) then ThisNPC:NarrationNow("$$COLT_0520010_13") end if( dice == 1) then ThisNPC:NarrationNow("$$COLT_0520010_15") end if( dice == 2) then ThisNPC:NarrationNow("$$COLT_0520010_16") end --ThisNPC:SetTimer( NPC_520010.TIMER_HightLevitation_ID, NPC_520010.TIMER_HightLevitation_TIME ) end
-- 공중 부양 발사 function NPC_520010:OnActLevitation( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog("NPC_520010:OnActLevitation()\n")
local Field = ThisActor:GetField() local Minion local index = math.random(0, NPC_520010.BOOK_COUNT-1)
for i = 0, NPC_520010.BOOK_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.BOOK_SpawnID + index ) if Minion:GetCurrentTalent() == -1 then break end index = index + 1 if NPC_520010.BOOK_COUNT <= index then index = 0 end end -- for
if Minion:GetCurrentTalent() ~= -1 then return end
AsNPC(ThisActor):FaceTo( Minion ) Minion:UseTalent( NPC_520010.BOOK_FIRE + (index * 100), Enemy ) end
function NPC_520010:OnActLevitationBig( ThisActor, Enemy ) local Field = ThisActor:GetField() local Minion local index = math.random( 0, NPC_520010.BRAZIER_COUNT-1 )
for i = 0, NPC_520010.BRAZIER_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.BRAZIER_SpawnID + index ) if Minion:GetCurrentTalent() == -1 then break end index = index + 1 if NPC_520010.BRAZIER_COUNT <= index then index = 0 end end -- for
if Minion:GetCurrentTalent() == -1 then Minion:UseTalent( NPC_520010.BRAZIER_FIRE, Enemy ) return end
index = math.random( 0, NPC_520010.CHAIR_COUNT-1 )
for i = 0, NPC_520010.CHAIR_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.CHAIR_SpawnID + index ) if Minion:GetCurrentTalent() == -1 then break end index = index + 1 if NPC_520010.CHAIR_COUNT <= index then index = 0 end end -- for
if Minion:GetCurrentTalent() == -1 then Minion:UseTalent( NPC_520010.CHAIR_FIRE, Enemy ) end end
function NPC_520010:OnActLevitationMultiple( ThisActor, Enemy ) local Field = ThisActor:GetField() local Minion local Target
for i = 0, NPC_520010.BOOK_COUNT-1 do -- GLog("NPC_520010:OnActLevitationMultiple() "..NPC_520010.BOOK_SpawnID + i.." "..NPC_520010.BOOK_FIRE + (i * 100).."\n") Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.BOOK_SpawnID + i ) Target = AsNPC(ThisActor):Aggro("random", 0) Minion:Wait(i) Minion:UseTalent( NPC_520010.BOOK_FIRE + (i * 100), Target ) end
for i = 0, NPC_520010.BRAZIER_COUNT-1 do -- GLog("1") Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.BRAZIER_SpawnID + i ) Target = AsNPC(ThisActor):Aggro("random", 0) Minion:Wait((i*2)+5) Minion:UseTalent( NPC_520010.BRAZIER_FIRE, Target ) end
for i = 0, NPC_520010.CHAIR_COUNT-1 do -- GLog("2") Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.CHAIR_SpawnID + i ) Target = AsNPC(ThisActor):Aggro("random", 0) Minion:Wait((i*2)+6) Minion:UseTalent( NPC_520010.CHAIR_FIRE, Target ) end end
-- 공중 부양 끝 function NPC_520010:OnFinishLevitation( ThisActor, Enemy ) -- GLog("NPC_520010:OnFinishLevitation()\n")
local Field = ThisActor:GetField() local Minion
for i = 0, NPC_520010.BOOK_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.BOOK_SpawnID+i ) --Minion:ClearJob() Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.BOOK_LANDING ) end -- for
for i = 0, NPC_520010.BRAZIER_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.BRAZIER_SpawnID+i ) --Minion:ClearJob() Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.BRAZIER_LANDING ) end -- for
for i = 0, NPC_520010.CHAIR_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.CHAIR_SpawnID+i ) --Minion:ClearJob() Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.CHAIR_LANDING ) end -- for end
-- 높은 공중 부양 시작 function NPC_520010:OnStartHightLevitation( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog("NPC_520010:OnStartHightLevitation()\n")
local Field = ThisActor:GetField() local Minion
for i = 0, NPC_520010.BOOK_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.BOOK_SpawnID+i ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.BOOK_Levitation ) end -- for
for i = 0, NPC_520010.BRAZIER_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.BRAZIER_SpawnID+i ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.BRAZIER_Levitation ) end -- for
for i = 0, NPC_520010.CHAIR_COUNT-1 do Minion = Field:GetSpawnNPC( NPC_520010.CHAIR_SpawnID+i ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.CHAIR_Levitation ) end -- for
local ThisNPC = AsNPC(ThisActor) ThisNPC:SetTimer( NPC_520010.TIMER_HightLevitation_ID, NPC_520010.TIMER_HightLevitation_TIME ) end
-- 눈부신 용모 설명. function NPC_520010:OnActShowFace( ThisActor, Enemy ) ThisActor:NarrationNow("$$COLT_0520010_4") end
-- 공중 부유 발사 큰거 -- <ACTION type="lua" param1="NPC_520010" param2="LevitationBigFire"/>
function NPC_520010:LevitationBigFire( ThisNPC, Enemy ) ThisNPC:MoveToMarker( NPC_520010.MARKER_Levitation ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.TALENT_Levitation_Fire2 ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.TALENT_HightLevitation_Start ) end
function NPC_520010:OnDie( despawnInfo ) NPC_520010:OnFinishLevitation( this, nil ) end
function NPC_520010:OnTimer( timerID ) --GLog("NPC_520010:OnTimer() "..timerID.."\n")
-- 공중 부유 상태에서 일정 시간이 지나면 내려온다. if timerID == NPC_520010.TIMER_Levitation_ID then this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.TALENT_Levitation_Finish ) elseif timerID == NPC_520010.TIMER_HightLevitation_ID then this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.TALENT_HightLevitation_Finish ) end end
-- 지팡이, 가면 떨구기 function NPC_520010:AccDamage( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) local stickAcc = 0
-- Acc for pain local painAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_520010.UD_PAIN ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_520010.UD_PAIN, painAcc )
-- Acc for Bparts if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( NPC_520010.BPART_STAFF ) == false then stickAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_520010.UD_STAFF ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_520010.UD_STAFF, stickAcc ) end
-- 죽을 때 마스크 벗기기. if ThisNPC:GetHP() <= HitInfo.Damage then -- GLog("NPC_520010:AccDamage() Break BPART_MASK\n") ThisNPC:BreakPart( NPC_520010.BPART_MASK , HitInfo.Attacker ) end
-- 공중 부유 중에는 pain을 하지 않는다. if NPC_520010.MODE_BREAKSTICK < ThisNPC:GetMode() or ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_520010.TALENT_PAIN ) or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_520010.TALENT_Levitation_Finish or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_520010.TALENT_HightLevitation_Finish or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_520010.TALENT_ShowFace_Fast or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_520010.TALENT_ShowFace_Say then
return Hitinfo end
-- pain처리. if NPC_520010.LIMIT_BREAKSTICK <= stickAcc then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:NonDelaySay("$$COLT_0520010_2") ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.TALENT_BreakStick ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( NPC_520010.BPART_STAFF , HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_520010.UD_STAFF, 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_520010.UD_PAIN, 0 )
elseif NPC_520010.LIMIT_PAIN <= painAcc then ThisNPC:ClearJob() local dice = math.random(0,6) if( dice == 0) then ThisNPC:SayNow("$$COLT_0520010_9") end if( dice == 1) then ThisNPC:SayNow("$$COLT_0520010_10") end if( dice == 2) then ThisNPC:SayNow("$$COLT_0520010_11") end if( dice == 3) then ThisNPC:SayNow("$$COLT_0520010_12") end if( dice == 4) then ThisNPC:SayNow("$$COLT_0520010_18") end if( dice == 5) then ThisNPC:SayNow("$$COLT_0520010_19") end if( dice == 6) then ThisNPC:SayNow("$$COLT_0520010_20") end ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_520010.TALENT_PAIN ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_520010.UD_PAIN, 0 ) end
return HitInfo end
-- 전체 function NPC_520010:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_520010:AccDamage( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_520010:OnHitCapsule_2_0(HitInfo) return NPC_520010:AccDamage( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_520010:OnHitCapsule_3_0(HitInfo) return NPC_520010:AccDamage( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_520010:OnFinishAndAggroShort( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_520010:OnFinishAndAggroRandom( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) end
